title: Getting Started
content:
# Gettings started with Mixeway

Installation of Mixeway is pretty straight forward. All you need is OpenSSL (or valid SSL Certificates)
and docker-compose command, then clone repo
```
git clone https://github.com/Mixeway/MixewayHub
```

initialize variables 
```
cd MixewayHub
./setup.sh
``` 

This operation will create certificates keys and key stores under `pki` directory and then just set `environment`
variables which are being set at dockers. Next,
```
docker-compose pull
docker-compose up -d
```

which will run the Mixeway in background.

Finally, use Your browser to navigate to
```
https://<Your-IP-Goes-here>
```
